metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3258 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the WriteProlog function in filter/texttopdf.c in texttopdf in cups-filters before 1.0.70 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a small line size in a print job.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3258` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups-browsed - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.5
cups-filters - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.5
cups-filters-core-drivers - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.5
libcupsfilters1 - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.5
libfontembed1 - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups-filters package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.52-0ubuntu1.5').
